title: People removing graffiti from the Qasr al-Nīl Bridge
description: Photographer's description: The day after Mubarak stepped down (Saturday; February 12; 2011) there were cleanup crews everywhere including the Kasr el Nil bridge. This group is removing graffiti.
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: People removing graffiti from the Qasr al-Nīl Bridge
